member.name: T:Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.Security.SecurityClientTransactionExtension
member.summary: Adds security checks to the following re-store operations: object creation and deletion, queries, relation and property reads and writes.

member.name: T:Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.Security.SecurityClientTransactionFactory
member.summary: Implementation of the interface that creates root s and adds a when the transaction is created in an application that has a security provider configured.
